content.question: Apollodorus of Damascus included which of the following components in his overall design for the Forum of Trajan?

choices.label: An amphitheater across from the central courtyard
A central library that featured a large dome
A sculptural program that included obelisks

topic.text: 2.1: Cultural Contexts of Ancient Mediterranean Art

skill.text: Skill 1.B: Describe visual elements of a work of art (or group of related works of art), including-  a. form.  b. style.  c. materials.  d. technique.  e. content.
